notesStmt.note: Severe water damage at foot and occasionally other edges. Tidemarks, mould stains and large losses, all repaired and infilled. A few usage stains. Ink smeared while wet. Ink occasionally fugitive in water.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
